title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 575 - Shoreline Restrictions of the Adirondack Park Agency Act
content:

State Regulations
§ 575.1 - General rule
§ 575.2 - Measuring distances
§ 575.3 - Variances of less than two feet
§ 575.4 - Structures subject to building setback restrictions
§ 575.5 - Replacement and expansion of existing structures
§ 575.6 - Application of lot width restrictions
§ 575.7 - Application of sewage system setback restrictions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 575

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§15-2709, 24-0805, 24-0903; Executive Law, §§804, 809; art. 27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
